tns:patch.author: jdeanquin
tns:patch.description: add to dg_user_orgs the organisation that is under assignedOrgs in user table- Drop column

script.lang: insert into dg_user_orgs (user_id,org_id) select u.id,u.assigned_Org_Id from dg_user u where u.assigned_Org_Id is not null and not exists (select 1 from dg_user_orgs where org_id = u.assigned_org_id and user_id =u.id) and assigned_Org_Id <> -1 and exists (select 1 from amp_organisation o where o.amp_org_id = u.assigned_org_id ); alter table dg_user drop column assigned_org_id;
